title: Facilitate copying a command to clipboard
body: I often experiment with commands on the command line, and then want to copy them to cmd/ps1 scripts. This is usually unefficient, because most commands can wrap on multiple lines:

comments.body: Go grab PSReadline at https://github.com/lzybkr/PSReadLine and install the module. I do this all the time with Ctrl+a, Ctrl+c - which selects the entire command line (even when it spans multiple lines) and copies it to the clipboard.
